attributes.review: I wish I didn’t have to input personal info into the app immediately upon opening. But also, it readily forces propaganda down your throat with widely skewed facts/statistics. Color scheme is all out of date. Red white blue is out, BLACK AND YELLOW IS IN!! And who’s the pedophilic, disabled, racist, Cheeto Hitler on the app?

This app is quite startling with an image of a sex-offender right as you open it. 
A racist, xenophobic, homophobic, misogynistic, somewhat man is not what I was expecting on this app! From all the talk of Trump supporters, I thought I’d see a respectable man. Ha! Joke was on me! Hate for anyone to have to use this app.
attributes.title: A No-Go for the Cheeto Man😔🖐🏻

attributes.review: when i first opened the app the first thing i saw was a disgusting picture of toes and armpit hair. as someone with a week stomach i was sick for DAYS. disgusting. this app should not be available to people!! take it down at once.
attributes.title: i hate this app.

attributes.review: Ask for my location services and when I said no the app murdered my grandma. Trump is also working for the Chinese Government and selling my data to them. Nothing I can do so I guess I’ll give it a 1 star review :/
attributes.title: Extreme Privacy Concerns!!!

attributes.review:
Quite possibly one of the worst designed apps in the App Store. Multiple bugs , glitches, missing links, ect. Will not be using ever again. Thanks for nothing Don. I hope retirement treats you well.
   Xoxo,
   Gen Z
attributes.title: “Great” while it lasted... I guess

attributes.review: This was the worst app I’ve ever had. I saw a pic of him tongue kissing his daughter. Please apple delete this app forever and never let it come back before u lose a loyal Customer. He should not be voted president for 2020 this year is bad enough
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: they showed me a cheeto and now i don’t feel good. my stomach got growly then it exploded. now i’m at the er. now i’m going into surgery. surgery went good, they gave me a snack and guess what it was, CHEETOS. i have to have surgery again. and i’m broke. so thanks for putting me in debt. HATE THIS APP
attributes.title: i’m throwing up

attributes.review: It’s so cheaply made, like why? Why is it like that? Who even finds the funds for this? The news was all fake news, not even verified. If I could, I’d give it a 0 star rating, seeing as 1 star is too generous 💀💀💀
attributes.title: This app was terrible.

attributes.review: It was such a bad app that when I downloaded it I immediately got over 40 viruses and then I was hit bully a car!! And I took that as a sign to delete the app but now I can’t get the viruses off my phone! Worst app ever
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app has so many glitches!! It’s also extremely laggy. I downloaded the app and almost immediately it took hours to load one beautiful picture of the cheeto man!
attributes.title: Awful App
